# Build Dependencies sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get install -y libtool automake g++ make git tar
# Set Environment variables export LANG='en_US.UTF-8' export LANGUAGE='en_US.UTF-8'
#Download source code rm -rf xerces-c git clone https://github.com/apache/xerces-c.git cd xerces-c git checkout Xerces-C_3_2_1
sudo apt-get install -y locales #sudo locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 sudo locale-gen en_US en_US.UTF-8 sudo dpkg-reconfigure --frontend=noninteractive locales sudo update-locale LANG=$LANG sudo update-locale LANG=$LANGUAGE
# configure ./reconf ./configure
# make,test,install make make check sudo make install
# Verification if [ ! -f /usr/local/lib/libxerces-c-3.2.so ] || [ ! -f /usr/local/lib/libxerces-c.a ] || [ ! -f /usr/local/lib/libxerces-c.la ] || [ ! -f /usr/local/lib/libxerces-c.so ] then exit 1; fi
if [ ! -d /usr/local/lib/pkgconfig ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/dom ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/framework ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/internal ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/parsers ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/sax ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/sax2 ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/util ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/validators ] || [ ! -d /usr/local/include/xercesc/xinclude ] then exit 1;
fi
